'''Radiant Spincrystal 133''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Dream of Tranquility]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located by a pillar in [[Tequemecan Valley]].
